> 
> > 3. Shimada Kai
> >     Posted by: "Kitsuno"
> >     Date: Mon Dec 25, 2006 1:22 am ((PST))
> > 
> > I
> > notice on page 33
> > it says that Shimada Kai studied Shinkeito Ryu in
> > Edo, but everywhere
> > else indicates Shingyoto Ryu- was this just a
> > mistake, or is there
> > more to it?
> 
> That's just a reading mistake. "Shingyoto-ryu" can
> be
> mistakenly read as "Shinkeito-ryu". But the correct
> pronunciation is "Shingyoto-ryu", created by Iba
> Zesuiken.
> 
> Iba Hachiro, a famous swordsmen during the Boshin
> War,
> was one of the most proeminent practitioners of this
> fencing style.


Serizawa Kamo

"I am the bone of my sword.
    Steel is my body,and fire is my blood.
  I have created over a thousand blades.
       Unknown to Death.
   Nor known to Life.
Have withstood pain to create many weapons.
     Yet, those hands will never hold anyting.
         So as I pray, unlimited blade works."

                               (Fate/Stay Night)
